item.title: Report X-2024110097
item.description:
Report X-2024110097

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-06T12:32:05+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-31
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CBTX 742541 was reported to be releasing in the Union Pacific Salt Lake City yard. After inspection it was found CBTX 742541 was releasing from the packing gland at the BOV, the packing gland was tightened stopping the release. Approximately 1 gallon of Diesel Fuel released to the ballast.
